Tomorrow is Pre-Camp Orientation for EVERYBODY!!! 9am SHARP!!!

- Bring a container to keep water cold
- Bring any extra snacks that you may need throughout the day
*** Please remember we are asking each family to bring one case of water for camp!

See you all in the morning!!!

Mr. K.

Merritt Academy Bands
Senior Spotlight
Lindsay Volz
Member of the High School Wind Ensemble & Marching Band (Saxophone)

I have been in the marching band and concert band for 2 years, and I started my junior year.

My favorite part of being in band was making so many fun memories, and laughing until I was crying at all the dorky stuff Mr. Kimsey would do with his students. It made me feel like I belonged, and it was my safe place away from the stress of my life.

My favorite memory is definitely meeting Mr Kimsey, as I remember being so terrified of what was to come, and he greeted me with open arms.

Being a part of the band has taught me perseverance and toughness through it all, as well as how to handle the things I struggle with on a daily basis. I also learned how to appreciate music and the people around me so much more.

My number one piece of advice is always trust Mr. K, and remember that he LOVES every single one of his students, and will always put aside time to help you no matter what.
